The product is distributed via physical install media (CD) or via download from the [[Cyberlink]] website. PowerDVD is often bundled with a variety of PC systems and peripherals (particularly optical drives).<ref>[http://www.cdrlabs.com/Reviews/lg-gh22lp20-22x-super-multi-dvdrw/Software-Bundle.html CDRLabs.com - Software Bundle | LG GH22LP20 22x "Super-Multi" DVDÂ±RW/RAM | Reviews]</ref><ref>[http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_hb5599/is_200109/ai_n23586400 Panasonic DVDBurner Bundled With CyberLink's PowerDVD & PowerVCR II | DVD News | Find Articles at BNET]</ref><ref>[http://www.cdrinfo.com/Sections/News/Details.aspx?NewsId=19137 PowerDVD HD264 Bundled with High-definition Gigabyte Graphics Card Solution]</ref>
The product is distributed via physical install media (CD) or via download from the [[Cyberlink]] website. PowerDVD is often bundled with a variety of PC systems and peripherals (particularly optical drives).<ref>[http://www.cdrlabs.com/Reviews/lg-gh22lp20-22x-super-multi-dvdrw/Software-Bundle.html CDRLabs.com - Software Bundle | LG GH22LP20 22x "Super-Multi" DVDÂ±RW/RAM | Reviews]</ref><ref>[http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_hb5599/is_200109/ai_n23586400 Panasonic DVDBurner Bundled With CyberLink's PowerDVD & PowerVCR II | DVD News | Find Articles at BNET]</ref><ref>[http://www.cdrinfo.com/Sections/News/Details.aspx?NewsId=19137 PowerDVD HD264 Bundled with High-definition Gigabyte Graphics Card Solution]</ref>
